comment.body: Where I can use KaffieId? I created one, but it dont want work. I change in ZeroMe profile to this one created with KaffieId, but when I post something it goes `Content publish failed.`. On Zeroblogs or Zeroforums I cant choose profile created with KaffieId (in list with profile its have grey color and cant be clicked).
Hmm. I write comment with Kaffie ID, but only in my spawn account I can see it. I tried fresh install, and there isnt this comment from spawn Kaffies ID under this topic.
